page.title: 03LOCAL CONCERNS
page.content: Some people think that the {EEC} regulations are bad.Younger peoples jobs are hard to find and effect parents. People are worried about French milk and doorstep deliveries being stopped. Hooliganism and Vandalism were mentioned as worries but they are not rife in{LIFTON. }Some women think that more leisure facilities should be for them. People are concerned about drugs and the misuse of drugs on animals. Some people think that there should be tighter speed limits on the{A30. One person was concerned about the old aged in a rural area.Nuclear war bothered some people (if a war occurs). Traffic noise also gave some concern.
